Name: my-shipment
Label: My Shipment

Components.Label: Search
Components.Query:
select ds.*,'{SearchNo}' as SearchNo,
pol.Name as polName,
pod.Name as podName,
pt.Name as ptName,
format(ds.EtdDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS etdDate,
format(ds.EtaDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS etaDate,
receipt.Name AS PlaceofReceipt,
destination.Name AS Destination,
incoterm.Name AS incoterm ,
 deli.Name  AS TermOfDelivery,
como.Name AS Commodity,
ds.Quantity ,
Concat(ds.Quantity,' | ',unit.Name) AS Pieces,
ds.CBM AS Measuament,
ds.GW AS totalWeight,
ds.Vessel AS Vessel,
ds.VesselVoy AS Voyage,
ds.ContainerText,
(select top 1 concat(format(EtaTsDate,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'/',format(EtdTsDate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) from EntityTransit where EntityId = ds.ParentId and PortTransitId = ds.PortTransitId) as etaTsDate,
creator.FullName AS FullName,
creator.Avatar AS Avatar,
dep.Name AS DEP,
creator.PhoneNumber AS phone,
creator.Email AS email
from Shipment ds
left join Terminal pol on ds.POLId = pol.Id
left join Terminal pod on ds.PODId = pod.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal receipt ON ds.PlaceReceiptId = receipt.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal destination ON destination.Id=ds.FinalDestinationId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData incoterm ON ds.IncotermId =incoterm.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData deli ON ds.TypeMoveId = deli.id
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData como ON ds.CommodityId = como.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON ds.UnitId = unit.Id
left join Terminal pt on ds.PortTransitId = pt.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] creator ON ds.InsertedBy = creator.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData dep ON dep.id=creator.DepartmentId
where (ds.HblNo = '{SearchNo}' or ds.BookingNo = '{SearchNo}' and ds.CustomerId = '{TokenUserId}')

Components.Label: Pick up place/ Place of receipt
Container List
Shipment Status History

Components.FormatData: {FullName}
Components.Label: Name
ShipmentNew
Components.Query:
{
    "sql": "select ds.*,
pol.Name as polName,
pod.Name as podName,
pt.Name as ptName,
format(ds.EtdDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS etdDate,
format(ds.EtaDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS etaDate,
receipt.Name AS PlaceofReceipt,
destination.Name AS Destination,
incoterm.Name AS incoterm ,
 deli.Name  AS TermOfDelivery,
como.Name AS Commodity,
ds.Quantity ,
Concat(ds.Quantity,' | ',unit.Name) AS Pieces,
ds.CBM AS Measuament,
ds.GW AS totalWeight,
ds.Vessel AS Vessel,
ds.VesselVoy AS Voyage,
ds.ContainerText,
(select top 1 concat(format(EtaTsDate,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'/',format(EtdTsDate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) from EntityTransit where EntityId = ds.ParentId and PortTransitId = ds.PortTransitId) as etaTsDate,
creator.FullName AS FullName,
creator.Avatar AS Avatar,
dep.Name AS DEP,
creator.PhoneNumber AS phone,
creator.Email AS email
from Shipment ds
left join Terminal pol on ds.POLId = pol.Id
left join Terminal pod on ds.PODId = pod.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal receipt ON ds.PlaceReceiptId = receipt.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal destination ON destination.Id=ds.FinalDestinationId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData incoterm ON ds.IncotermId =incoterm.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData deli ON ds.TypeMoveId = deli.id
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData como ON ds.CommodityId = como.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON ds.UnitId = unit.Id
left join Terminal pt on ds.PortTransitId = pt.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] creator ON ds.InsertedBy = creator.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData dep ON dep.id=creator.DepartmentId where (ds.ParentId is not null and CustomerId = '{TokenUserId}')",
    "total": "select count(ds.Id) as total from Shipment as ds where (ds.ParentId is not null and CustomerId = '{TokenUserId}')"
}

Components.Label: ShipmentNew
Components.Query:
{
    "sql": "select ds.*,
pol.Name as polName,
pod.Name as podName,
pt.Name as ptName,
format(ds.EtdDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS etdDate,
format(ds.EtaDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS etaDate,
receipt.Name AS PlaceofReceipt,
destination.Name AS Destination,
incoterm.Name AS incoterm ,
 deli.Name  AS TermOfDelivery,
como.Name AS Commodity,
ds.Quantity ,
Concat(ds.Quantity,' | ',unit.Name) AS Pieces,
ds.CBM AS Measuament,
ds.GW AS totalWeight,
ds.Vessel AS Vessel,
ds.VesselVoy AS Voyage,
ds.ContainerText,
(select top 1 concat(format(EtaTsDate,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'/',format(EtdTsDate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) from EntityTransit where EntityId = ds.ParentId and PortTransitId = ds.PortTransitId) as etaTsDate,
creator.FullName AS FullName,
creator.Avatar AS Avatar,
dep.Name AS DEP,
creator.PhoneNumber AS phone,
creator.Email AS email
from Shipment ds
left join Terminal pol on ds.POLId = pol.Id
left join Terminal pod on ds.PODId = pod.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal receipt ON ds.PlaceReceiptId = receipt.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal destination ON destination.Id=ds.FinalDestinationId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData incoterm ON ds.IncotermId =incoterm.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData deli ON ds.TypeMoveId = deli.id
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData como ON ds.CommodityId = como.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON ds.UnitId = unit.Id
left join Terminal pt on ds.PortTransitId = pt.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] creator ON ds.InsertedBy = creator.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData dep ON dep.id=creator.DepartmentId
 where (ds.TypeId in (3) and ds.ParentId is not null and ds.CustomerId = '{TokenUserId}')",
    "total": "select count(ds.Id) as total from Shipment as ds where (ds.TypeId in (3) and ds.ParentId is not null and ds.CustomerId = '{TokenUserId}')"
}

LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] creator ON ds.InsertedBy = creator.Id
